desc: Tools for heating and bending 18 inch to 20 foot long lengths of PVC Pipe with 1/2 inch to 8 inch diameter. Make the longest bends up to 20 feet. For short bends use in longer lengths of 1 1/4 inside diameter pipe use the B Series PVCBendit. 120 vac. Watts increase with length of PVC pipe bender. Bend 1/2 3/4 1 2
